channel.title: Looking for Gregor Hutton's AD 316 32-page preview from Gen Con 2009?
channel.description: Does it still exist out there somewhere? I recently discovered the delights of 3:16, and would love to see the Spotlight rules by Gregor that were going to be part of AD 316 (which was never completed or published).

item.title: Looking for Gregor Hutton's AD 316 32-page preview from Gen Con 2009?
item.dc:creator: @oskel
item.description:
@oskel wrote:

Yeah, I’ve been through his site, he doesn’t have this 32 page preview there, unfortunately.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for Gregor Hutton's AD 316 32-page preview from Gen Con 2009?

item.title: Looking for Gregor Hutton's AD 316 32-page preview from Gen Con 2009?
item.dc:creator: @Majcher
item.description:
@Majcher wrote:

He’s got some PDFs up, but they’re very minimal, and I don’t think they hit the Spotlight stuff that you’re looking for.

https://gregorhutton.com/boxninja/ad316/

Read full topic
